subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: New details about the vetting process for Rutgers’s new athletic director, Julie Hermann, raise serious questions about how she was chosen to restore a tarnished program.
snippet: New details about the vetting process for Rutgers’s new athletic director, Julie Hermann, raise serious questions about how she was chosen to restore a tarnished program.
